OOC: Well excuse me! The site as well as the message boards are down, you k=
now! By the way, where are Alloran's characters Torca, Godfather, Banzai-Tr=
on, and Sharpedge and what are they doing?...

BIC: The Radicons go to work=
, trying to fix up the ship, leaving the planet on their minds...

  ----- =
Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 18, 2001 1:31 AM
  Subject: WRESTLING??! / IG=
L


  Allright, this is partly my fault (there was a big storm in my area a=
nd I lost net connection for a while, hence the site being down), but next =
time there is a wrestling debate like this using RPG email, quite a few peo=
ple are going to permenately (and painfully) lose the ability to type.

  H=
aving said that, sorry that I havn't posted today till now. My mom had surg=
ery this morning and I've been taking care of her. She's asleep now, so I'm=
 posting.

  ::Cledar/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::

  Firearm growls at whoever =
called him a rustbucket. "Watch your mouth. I might miss and hit you during=
 my match."

  He enters his arena, running some diagnostics on his weapons=
 to make sure they were all functioning.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~
  Cledar and his troops enter their arenas, now commenting on being c=
alled rustbuckets. THey would have, of course, gladdly shot at the one who =
called them that, except that would get them all killed.



   

  Your use=
 of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
